commit.message:
* c-lex.c (fe_file_change): Don't transform to_line with SOURCE_LINE.

From-SVN: r71328

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2003-09-11  Mike Stump  <mrs@apple.com>
+
+	* c-lex.c (fe_file_change): Don't transform to_line with SOURCE_LINE.
+
